title: 100s of SpaceX Starships land on Mars after a 6 month journey. 1000s of Martian colonists being building Mars Base 1
tuit: You want to wake up in the morning and think the future is going to be great - and that’s what being a spacefaring civilization is all about. It’s about believing in the future and thinking that the future will be better than the past. And I can’t think of anything more exciting than going out there and being among the stars

title: Tesla FSD finally makes driving obsolete. After years of delay, Tesla Full Self Driving can drive you to work while you work, play or sleep
tuit: Autopilot is an advanced driver assistance system that assists your car with steering , accelerating and braking for other vehicles and pedestrians within its lane. It assists with the most burdensome parts of driving and works alongside features like emergency braking, collision warning and blind-spot monitoring. With Full Self-Driving (FSD) capability, you will get access to a suite of more advanced driver assistance features, designed to provide more active guidance and assisted driving under your active supervision.

title: SpaceX's Huge Starship Rocket Could Launch as Early as Next Month
tuit: SpaceX’s super-heavy lift rocket could finally be ready to embark on its first orbital test flight in December. Starship is a fully reusable, super heavy-lift launch vehicle designed to go to Earth orbit, the Moon, and possibly even further destinations like Mars. SpaceX CEO Elon Musk has been eager to see Starship fly, earlier suggesting that the rocket may take off in November. The upper stage Starship 24 prototype is currently undergoing tests at the Starbase facility where it stands fully stacked on the pad.
